By The Numbers   Social Media   News & Events   NYU Stern Street Team     Academics Business Degree   Business & Political Economy Degree   Faculty   Academic Advising   Research   Practitioners Seminar   Stern Bulletin     Stern Around the World International Studies Program   Business & Political Economy Degree Program   Short-Term Immersions   Semester Away     Social Impact Social Impact Curriculum   Social Impact Initiatives     Dynamic Community Building Community   Living & Learning in New York City   Leadership Initiatives   Student Clubs and Organizations     Future Success Professional Development   Internships & Careers     Admissions Financial Aid   Transfer Applicants   Apply               Home / Programs & Admissions / Undergraduate / Stern Around the World / International Studies Program                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              International Studies Program  Experience global business firsthand  Since 2001, the Barr Family International Studies Program (ISP) has explored the economic, cultural and political histories of countries. Every Stern junior pursuing a Business degree or BPE degree (beginning with BPE Class of '17) completes the one-of-a-kind course during the spring semester. ISP presents the real-world opportunities and challenges for international firms today.    This semester-long course includes an international trip during Spring Break to one of three cities in Asia, Europe or South America. Students travel overseas together, focus on a specific industry, meet with company executives and observe a country’s culture firsthand. ISP culminates in the hallmark ISP Competition where students compete in small groups, and present a capstone assignment to classmates, professors and deans.    Recent ISP locations include:     Barcelona, Spain    Budapest, Hungary    Buenos Aires, Argentina    Santiago, Chile    Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam    Singapore    ISP is made possible thanks to the generous support of Stern alumnus and Overseer Edward Barr and his wife Nancy.                                                    Take Action     Visit Our Campus   Attend a Class   Apply to NYU Stern                                               Video: International Studies Program                    Why Stern? Reason 4:      The only school that does global on this scale .    The International Studies Program course has given 5000+ Stern juniors a real world perspective on the business practices in internationals cities like Hong Kong, Singapore, Barcelona, Berlin, Buenos Aires, and Santiago. Coursework done in the classroom prepares you for your week-long trip where you will attend lectures by faculty from top business schools around the world, visit international companies to get an inside view of their business from senior executives, experience the unique culture of your travel city through group activities that you will remember for a lifetime.
